wikipedia_page.main: Paul McLaughlin (born 9 December 1965) is a Scottish former footballer.

link_mentions.page: List of Derry City F.C. players

response: Having never appeared competitively for Celtic, Murdoch became Partick Thistle's record signing in February 1991, moving permanently for a fee of £85,000 in a combined transfer involving Paul McLaughlin – again it was Lambie who made the deal, with the latter having also returned to Firhill. The record may have been broken by the 2017 signing of Niall Keown, but the transfer fee was not disclosed publicly.
